subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
Corruption (Institutional)
lead_paragraph: Daniel Flynn, chief executive and secretary general of U.S. Soccer, answered questions about the organization’s knowledge of widespread corruption in FIFA, in place of Sunil Gulati, the president of U.S. Soccer and a top executive in FIFA.
snippet: Daniel Flynn, chief executive and secretary general of U.S. Soccer, answered questions about the organization’s knowledge of widespread corruption in FIFA, in place of Sunil Gulati, the president of U.S. Soccer and a top executive in FIFA.
